Name: The Great Pickle Adventure
About the game: The Great Pickle Adventure is at its heart a pickle-based platformer. During early access expect to have many frequent updates shaped by the community. Updates can range from mechanics changes to level updates to completely new levels and features. Explore 20+ themed levels and special play levels Move as fast as you can to get the best time possible or explore at your leisure Fight through 20+ enemies to gain XP and buy upgrades in the shop Tired of the constant timer? Try out the built-in RPG or 9 levels of breakout in Special Levels. Join our discord:
